product_name: Polar M400 GPS Fitness Monitor and Heart Rate Monitor Bundle - White
long_description: As your new training partner, this white GPS fitness monitor delivers all the usual heart rate data plus in-depth training progress and feedback so you can reach goals and improve your running index.
short_description: As your new training partner, this white GPS fitness monitor delivers all the usual heart rate data plus in-depth training progress and feedback so you can reach goals and improve your running index.
